actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A concurrent resolution urging the President of the United States to enter into trade negotiations with representatives of the Government of Japan with respect to the establishment of Japanese auto production facilities in the United States.

summary.text: Urges the President to: (1) negotiate an agreement with Japan to require Japanese auto manufacturers to build facilities in the United States and to use North American parts in Japanese autos sold in the United States in exchange for retaining access to the American market; (2) phase in an agreement setting quotas of U.S. parts to be used in Japanese cars; and (3) report to Congress on the progress of the negotiations.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution urging the President of the United States to enter into trade negotiations with representatives of the Government of Japan with respect to the establishment of Japanese auto production facilities in the United States.
